title: Conservator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, reveal yourself as the Conservator.
- If you are revealed, during the day you may Order a player to visit a Target player.
- When the night ends, you will receive a message on whether or not your Ordered player visited your Target player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players get an alert at the beginning of the night that they were Ordered to visit your Target player.
- If you are revealed and Day 3 has passed, you gain an extra vote.
- If no one was lynched the previous day and you are revealed, you gain 2 extra votes.
- You may not Order a player to visit themselves.
- You may not Order a player to visit no one.
